DOC.brief_summary: Post traumatic amputees with an experience of over 3 months of prosthesis use at home, without any known difficulty using the prosthesis and without stump pathology, using no assistive devices, will be examined in a 3 D computerized gait laboratory. Kinematic and kinetic parameters of gait will be obtained.
DOC.brief_title: Gait Evaluation of Experienced Below Knee Amputees
DOC.criteria: Post traumatic trans tibial amputees No stump pathology No assistive devices No technical difficulty Vascular or DM background Stump pathology Gait difficulties Assistive device
